BREAST-COMPOSITION: The breast tissue in this mammogram image appears to be heterogeneously dense, indicating a mix of fatty and glandular tissues.
FINDINGS: There is an oval-shaped opacity with ill-defined margins, measuring approximately 1.5 cm in diameter, located in the upper outer quadrant of the left breast. This finding suggests a benign lesion, possibly a fibroadenoma or a complex cyst, and requires short-term follow-up to confirm stability.
